name: The Tree of Life (talamancabu)
description:
Enter the maze in search for the meaning of life. 

Will you be able to get a hold of the truth or will you abandon your journey in search of an easier way? 

This short game will make you think about the meaning of life (kind of) while  also giving you some unnedeed advice.

Movement is with the arrow keys, to talk with the NPCs just walk towards them.
